text: (Yadagara) jaba inkara garneharule aphno hrdayama hathala'i prasraya di'e, ra ajnanapurvaka hatha gare. Tasartha allahale aphno rasulamathi ra imanavalaharumathi santosa avatarati garyo. Ra allahale musalamanaharula'i sanyamako kurama drdha, rakhyo, ra uniharu yasako dherai hakadara ra yogya pani thi'e, ra allaha ta pratyeka kura jandacha
